channel.title: OldScoolRemake - Need a Team -
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape this is a OldschoolRemake project, This is not going to be the name we will let you choose that. I'm looking for a Development Team.
We will Update you here of the Most recent Updates
Development Team Update's
How to get in the Team? Add me on Msn and say how you could be of help, Forum's,GFX,Ingame and/or Client Msn - Neonglow.liam@hotmail.co.uk
- Liam
Development Team Coders - Liam - Matty
Forum Designers - N/A
GFX Workers - Frosty - Roy
Client Developer - N/A
Pictures (These will Be Added when i've Found a Team.)
I've got a Base - Blank Source
[code]Updates. 15/11/10 - Downloaded a Blank base. 15/11/10 - Updated a Interface when you Logg on. 15/11/10 - Changed Quest Tab Abit.[/code]
Major Updates Will Happen Soon
